row.entry: Four piles on left. To be built up in suit from Ace to King.

Seven piles. Deal card face up in first pile. Place one card face down on all other piles. Place one card face up on next pile followed by one card face down on all covered piles. Repeat until there are seven cards in last pile. Deal the rest of the cards face up on the second to seventh piles. To be built down in opposite color.

sect2.title: Objetivo
sect2.para: Mova todas as cartas para as pilhas fundação.

sect2.title: Regras
sect2.para: Cards in Tableau are built down in opposite color. Groups of cards can be moved regardless of sequence. A faced-down card is flipped when it is unburied. An empty pile in the Tableau can be filled with a King or a group of cards with a King on the bottom.
Foundations are built up in suit from Ace to King. Cards in Foundations are no longer in play.

sect2.title: Pontuação
sect2.para: Você ganha um ponto por cada carta nas pilhas de fundação.

sect2.title: Estratégia
sect2.para: Try and uncover as many cards as early on as possible. Doing so will greatly aid your quest to conquer yukon.
